post.body: Hey guys, so i've noticed that all of the cp sites are gone(i'm happy for that) and was wondering if the admins were caught or they just removed the sites

comment.body: @Vanadium: There were a lot of cp sites, the porn section was filled with cp sites. I didn't knew how i could have reported it of the FBI(i guess i could have just said that there is cp on zeronet, but now they are gone fortunately
@Thunder: Dude you sound so Pedo, i feel like you are a cp website (or ZeroSite?!?) creator/owner.
